articles.title: From promise to reality: 10 years after breakthrough, a CRISPR solution to problems of health begins to take shape - The Indian Express
articles.description: Over the last 3 years, the gene-editing technology with near unlimited potential has produced flawless results in clinical trials. India has approved a 5-year project to develop CRISPR to cure sickle cell anaemia.
